Tripolye  

[Cucuteni-Trypillia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cucuteni%E2%80%93Trypillia_culture)  

[Yamnaya](Yamnaya.html) had two components of CHG: Unadmixed CHG with connections to Iran reaching the Volga in the 5th millennium and correlating with the arrival of agricultural settlements, cows and goats. Only later CHG admixed with Anatolian Farmers, likely via [Tripolye](Tripolye.html) (with signature elements of WHG). [Anthony 2019]  

See [Yamnaya](Yamnaya.html) [EEF](EEF.html) [Anatolia](Anatolia.html) [Maikop](Maikop.html) (mostly trade partners)
